channel.title: Invisible NPC's
channel.description: Im having trouble with iron drags being invisible and certain npcs's having invisible extremities and so on, on my server. Im assuming this is a client sided error. What could this be and how can I fix it? Source is insanityx.

item.title: Invisible NPC's
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Have you actually added the iron dragon models to your server?
